name: Disc-Licious
description:
This was my first game. I took a break from working on it in August, and never returned until recently to build out a "demo" version of it.

It's an endless skeet shooting game. The final project had a lot more, but since I have learned a lot since I started it, I will likely never go back to this.

If people think the base mechanic is fun though, I will possibly come back and finish it.
